title: Reading - Lila An Inquiry into Morals - By Robert M. Pirsig - Chapter 24
description: Hold recent events in mind when you read this chapter. It will transform your understanding not only of the problems we are hearing about in current affairs, but also of what to do about them, and why what is being proposed and implemented can't work.
